title: Rigger's Decision
description: Rigley Montgomery Atkins is a mess.If he never has to make another decision for as long as he lives, he’d be fine with that.Life would be simpler. The pressure would be gone. The storms raging in his mind could settle.But that’s not possible.Rigger is a adult, and adults need to make decisions all the time.If only there was a solution.If only there was someone willing to take control and calm his demons. Someone who wouldn’t judge him or ridicule him.Someone who could love him exactly like he is. **This is a 30k word novella. 100% standalone** (Fear Niblet)
author: Nicky James
